title: kuLirmati vadanE
sahitya:
kuLirmati vadanE kindu ceyu jnyAn kuru vindaradanE


anupallavi

  kalakaNThi vEgadAgamippan ninnarikennu kaLiyO sArasanAbhan kathiccatum taruNi


caraNam 1    kaNavanenne vEDijnyO munnamirunna karuNayinnu kuranjyO 
maNamArnnu vilasunna mandamArutameTTu maNimati bimbam kaNDumallaliyalunnayyO
    caraNam 2    pramadAjanathODO vancana vENDu paramatiniha cADO 
kamala nEtra nAkumen kamitavinE vaikAtE mama savidhamAnaya matta kOkila vANi
